Yes just burn it on a DVD-R disk using IMGBURN at the slowest compatible speed.IMGBurn will tell you the recommended speeds. On my the slowest was at 4x. It will not work unless you have a wii chip installed or have had your wii soft modded which basically means it has been hacked using software. To softmad your wii you will need an SD card and do what they tell you to do in this video tutorial on u tube titled
